Hydrodynamics Solvers
=====================

thornado's hydrodynamics solvers currently consist of those
for non-relativistic hydrodynamics, general relativistic hydrodynamics,
and general relativistic magnetohydrodynamics.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 4
   :caption: Hydrodynamics Solvers:

   NRHD
   GRHD
   GRMHD
